data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O3esb43CErUQ7kNvgH0A5iZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCUzGfGpVB-tOZVu49asjiQvDlB30gHvVz8jqH7vvsO4A&oe=6662ED37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cMSjMGgAyV4Q7kNvgGnPtKM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB-oI2izzqreyorCKKvCuNtvYUCWN1EiWeBAr89z3gYTQ&oe=6662FAD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0lMj_Lb4sP4Q7kNvgF87Ndl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDjUqoSd5aq-xxmcDbTMbE0zZHSHFD5giFdIECUE9_q9Q&oe=6662FE50)
